level.text: Notwithstanding the requirements of §1203.1 and §1203.3, developments that are subject to the requirements of Chapter 26 Inclusionary Zoning may use the following modifications to the CAP Overlay’s height, lot occupancy and FAR:
In the CAP/R-5-B, CAP/C-2-A, and CAP/SP-1 Overlay Districts:
The floor area ratio for new construction shall not exceed 2.16 FAR
The maximum building height shall not exceed forty (40) feet
In the CAP/R-5-B, and CAP/C-2-A Overlay Districts:
The lot occupancy shall not exceed seventy-five percent (75%);
The minimum lot size shall be 1,500 square feet; and
The minimum lot width shall be fifteen (15) feet.
